alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mitchell and southeastern Jewell Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Scottsville to near Glen Elder. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Beloit around 545 PM CDT. Scottsville around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Asherville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
